plot: Captain Phillips in a new adventure on his trip around the coast of Africa: an interracial, gay, musical, love story between one man and his pirate.
title: Captain Phillips and the Horn of Africa
plot_es: Captain Phillips in a new adventure on his trip around the coast of Africa: an interracial, gay, musical, love story between one man and his pirate.
original_name: Captain Phillips and the Horn of Africa
plot_en: Captain Phillips in a new adventure on his trip around the coast of Africa: an interracial, gay, musical, love story between one man and his pirate.
